description: Welcome to The Fairways! This spacious 3 bedroom townhouse in a sought-after FREEHOLD strata offers ideal North Shore living. Enjoy a cozy wood fireplace, a large patio for summer BBQs, and a bright kitchen with an eating area and convenient pass-thru to the dining room and oversized living room. Upstairs features 3 bedrooms, full sized laundry, and a beautiful new tub and shower in the bathrooms. The primary has room for a king bed, boasts a walk-in closet and oversized soaker tub. Newly painted, move-in ready, with 2 parking (1 covered), plus a storage room. Steps to Parkgate Village shopping and Seymour Golf Club. 15 mins to the ski slopes and only 5 minutes to Ron Andrews Recreation Centre or kayaking in Deep Cove, your North Van lifestyle awaits! SOLD FIRM
